title: ‘West Side Story’ and Top Five Steven Spielberg Movies
description:
This week marks the release of Steven Spielberg’s first musical, a remake and modest reimagining of the 1957 show and legendary 1961 film. Sean and Amanda are joined by Joanna Robinson to talk about the original, Spielberg's remake, and their five favorite Spielberg films.

Hosts: Sean Fennessey and Amanda Dobbins
Guest: Joanna Robinson
Producer: Bobby Wagner
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
